property.name: janusgraph_server_port
property.description: Sets the port JanusGraph Server binds to, default is 8182

property.name: janusgraph_hdfs_home_dir
property.description: A root location in HDFS for JanusGraph to write collection data to. Rather than specifying an HDFS location for the data directory or update log directory, use this to specify one root location and have everything automatically created within this HDFS

property.name: SimpleAuthenticator
property.description: Set whether to enable SimpleAuthenticator(PLAIN SASL), the credentials database is located at /usr/iop/current/janusgraph-client/data/credentials.kryo. Note: this option will not take effect if Knox is installed.

property.name: ssl.keyCertChainFile
property.description: The X.509 certificate chain file in PEM format. If this value is not present and ssl.enabled is true a self-signed certificate will be used (not suitable for production).

property.name: ssl.keyFile
property.description: The PKCS#8 private key file in PEM format. If this value is not present and ssl.enabled is true a self-signed certificate will be used (not suitable for production).

property.name: ssl.keyPassword
property.description: The password of the keyFile if it's not password-protected.

property.name: content
property.description: This is the template for janusgraph-env.sh file

property.name: janusgraph_download_url
property.description: JanusGraph download url. Currently defaults to version 0.2.0.
